wishes.text: Happy New Year to my amazing sister and bestie! May this year bring you all the joy you deserve!
Cheers to another year of sisterhood, friendship, laughter, and unforgettable memories!
May your New Year be as bright and beautiful as your smile!
Here to more temple visits, school memories, home time, and food treats together!
Thank you for being the best sister and bestie. Let us make this year even better!

quotes.text: A sister is a gift to the heart, a friend to the spirit, a golden thread to the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Isadora James

quotes.text: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: Sisters by heart, besties by choice.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, "What! You too? I thought I was the only one."
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: A sister is both your mirror and your opposite.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fishel

secret_messages.text: You are the sister I always wanted, the friend I always needed, and the bestie I will never deserve!
In a world full of temporary people, you are my forever sister and bestie. Thank you for being unapologetically you!
You have grown so much and I am honored to witness your journey. You are going to do amazing things!
You have this incredible ability to make everyone feel special, but you are the most special of all!
Thank you for painting my world with your colors. Life with you is never boring!

compliments.text: Your laugh is contagious and makes everything better!
You have the biggest heart of anyone I know!
Your strength inspires me every single day!
You are smarter than you give yourself credit for!
Your kindness changes lives, starting with mine!
You have an amazing sense of humor!
Your sisterhood and friendship is the greatest gift in my life!
You light up every room you enter!
You have this way of making everyone feel special!

scratch_messages.text: Your smile lights up the world!
I am so lucky to have you as my sister!
You are stronger than you know!
